actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement logic to persist API latency and error metrics in a rolling window to Redis for durability and multi-instance aggregation. This will improve observability and reliability of performance data across deployments.
implementation_steps: Add Redis client initialization in src/config/redis.js if not present.
Update scripts/bench/api-latency.js to write rolling window metrics to Redis after each run.
Modify src/utils/metrics.js to support reading/writing rolling window data from/to Redis.
Test persistence and retrieval of metrics across restarts and multiple instances.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and commit a migration plan for converting backend modules with high change-rate (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) to TypeScript, including a prioritized file list and migration guidelines.
implementation_steps: Create MIGRATION_PLAN.md outlining migration order and guidelines.
List high-change files in src/api/routes/* and src/chat/* for initial migration.
Add TypeScript configuration notes and any required tsconfig updates.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Add new Jest tests to cover MCP endpoints and provider health checks, focusing on integration and basic security validation.
implementation_steps: Identify untested MCP endpoints and provider health routes.
Write integration tests for endpoint responses, error handling, and security headers.
Run tests and ensure coverage is reported in CI.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedChatInterface: Provider Quick-Switch and Badge
actionable_tasks.description: Add a provider quick-switch UI and current provider badge to EnhancedChatInterface.jsx using useLLM().
implementation_steps: Import and use useLLM() hook to access provider switching logic.
Add a dropdown or button group for provider selection.
Display the current provider as a badge or chip in the chat UI.
Test switching providers and UI updates.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedMusicDiscovery: Mood Sliders and Feature Visualization
actionable_tasks.description: Implement client-only mood sliders and a mini radar/sparkline visualization for moodSettings values in EnhancedMusicDiscovery.jsx.
implementation_steps: Add slider components for moodSettings (e.g., energy, valence).
Implement a radar or sparkline chart using a lightweight chart library or SVG.
Bind slider values to the visualization and ensure real-time updates.
